description: This file defines a Kotlin Fragment class FavoritesFragment responsible for displaying a list of favorite recipes within the app. It manages UI components such as RecyclerView and TextView, interacts with data repositories serving favorites and recipes, and handles user interactions including toggling favorites and navigating to recipe details. The fragment also listens to a flow of favorite updates to refresh its display dynamically.

classes.name: FavoritesFragment
classes.description: A Fragment class that displays a list of favorite recipes, manages user interactions and updates the UI based on favorite recipe changes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the FavoritesStore using the current context.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout, sets up RecyclerView and adapter, observes favorites flow to update UI accordingly.
